mapper.update: update sys_order set rec_name=#{recName}, rec_phone=#{recPhone}, rec_address=#{recAddress}, state=#{state}, notes=#{notes} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, create_time, rec_name, rec_phone, rec_address, state, notes from sys_order where user_id = #{userId}
select id, create_time, rec_name, rec_phone, rec_address, user_id, state, notes from sys_order limit #{begin},#{size}

select id, create_time, rec_name, rec_phone, rec_address, user_id, state, notes from sys_order where rec_name like ('%${keyword}%') or rec_phone like ('%${keyword}%') or rec_address like ('%${keyword}%') or notes like ('%${keyword}%') limit ${begin},${size}
select count(1) total from sys_order where rec_name like ('%${keyword}%') or rec_phone like ('%${keyword}%') or rec_address like ('%${keyword}%') or notes like ('%${keyword}%')
